cells.data: -- takeCycle :: Int -> [a] -> [a]on takeCycle(n, xs)	set lng to length of xs	if lng â‰¥ n then		set cycle to xs	else		set cycle to concat(replicate((n div lng) + 1, xs))	end if		if class of xs is string then		items 1 thru n of cycle as string	else		items 1 thru n of cycle	end ifend takeCycle
